casebody.data:
GOODSON
v.
GLATFELTER CO. No. 464P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 25, 2005. John N. Fountain, Michael W. Ballance, Raleigh, for P.H. Glatfelter Co. Neville S. Fuleihan, Rutherfordton, Timothy L. Finger, for James Goodson. Langdon M. Cooper, Jesse V. Bone, Jr., Jason R. Shoemaker, Gastonia, for Langdon M. Cooper Trustee. Clementine Peterson, for N.C. Dept. of Insurance. Catherine Stuart, Charles C. Kyles, Raleigh, for N.C. Self-Ins. Guaranty.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of August 2005 by Defendant (P.H. Glatfelter Co.) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed pending the determination of the Defendant's petition for discretionary review by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of August 2005."
